requeststatustype.name: Pending Approval
requeststatustype.description: The approver must review the request

requeststatustype.name: Approved
requeststatustype.description: The approver has reviewed and accepted the request

requeststatustype.name: Rejected
requeststatustype.description: The approver has reviewed and did not accept the request

requeststatustype.name: Cancelled
requeststatustype.description: The request was removed before the approver could review it
